subject: Baseball
Memorabilia and Souvenirs
lead_paragraph: Jon Lester coasted to his A.L.-leading seventh win and visiting Boston scored seven runs off Cleveland’s Mitch Talbot in the first inning of the Indians’ most lopsided loss this season.
snippet: Jon Lester coasted to his A.L.-leading seventh win and visiting Boston scored seven runs off Cleveland’s Mitch Talbot in the first inning of the Indians’ most lopsided loss this season.
